about.description: Simple and beautiful logging for click applications

name: click-log
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "click-log" %}
{% set version = "0.3.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 16fd1ca3fc6b16c98cea63acf1ab474ea8e676849dc669d86afafb0ed7003124

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - click

test:
  requires:
    - pytest
  source_files:
    - tests
  imports:
    - click_log
  commands:
    - pytest tests/

about:
  home: https://github.com/click-contrib/click-log
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Logging integration for Click
  description: |
    Simple and beautiful logging for click applications
  doc_url: https://click-log.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/click-contrib/click-log 

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - CurtLH
